messages.message: Hi Emil, I'm really frustrated. I feel like I'm being pushed to churn from Microsoft Office, and it's disappointing because I rely on it daily.
I'm sorry to hear you're feeling this way, Fiona. Can you tell me what's been happening that led to this disappointment?
My subscription keeps getting renewed automatically without clear options to cancel easily. It's making me consider switching to another provider.
I understand your frustration. Let me assist you with managing your subscription and explore some options to better suit your needs.
That would be helpful. I just want to feel valued and have control over my subscriptions.
Absolutely, Fiona. I'll guide you through the cancellation process if you decide to go that route, or help you modify your plan to prevent future issues. Your satisfaction is important to us.
